author: wsjcom
title: Dennis Quaid Grew Up in a House That Prized Performing
text:
Dennis Quaid, 63, is an actor and musician who has appeared in more than 70 films, including “The Big Easy,” “The Parent Trap,” “The Right Stuff” and “Traffic.” He currently stars in “I Can Only Imagine” (Lionsgate). He spoke with Marc Myers.
I wanted a German shepherd when I was 9. Instead, my dad came home with a basset hound named Gertrude. She became my constant companion. But five years later, she disappeared.
We...
